task.title: How to Find a Room on AirClassroom

context.p: With the variety of classrooms on Virginia Tech's campus, you will want to make sure you find a classroom that meets all of your needs an expectations. By conducting a proper search, you will get the results you need.

step.cmd: Go to www.airclassroom.com and locate the "search" bar on the main page
In the search bar, enter in the date(s) you need the classroom, the amount of people, and the hall preference (if you have one in mind). Once filled out, click "search."

substep.cmd: Type in "Shanks Hall" for the hall preference to make the search easier.

step.cmd: If you don't like any of the classrooms you see, click on "Filters" to add more search options, such as price, size, and classroom capabilities..
Click on each listing to get more details about the classroom.
When you find something you like, refer to the "How to Book a Room on AirClassroom" section of this guide.
